column4: can i directly install ubuntu without bootind into the os? it takes a lot of time to boot.
did I not tell you the procedure before?

apt isn't meant for installing to /home and the location it installs to isn't easily changed
ok seems like compiling with prefix is my only option then
why can't you use apt the normal way? And what are you installing?

please not here, this channel is for ubuntu support
